Healing Signet.desc: Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

Resurrection Signet.desc: Signet. Resurrects target party member (100% Health, 25% Energy). This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.

Signet of Capture.desc: Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.

Power Block.desc: Elite Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled (1...10...12 seconds) and that skill is interrupted.

Mantra of Earth.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces earth damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take earth damage.

Mantra of Flame.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces fire damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take fire damage.

Mantra of Frost.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces cold damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take cold damage.

Mantra of Lightning.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Reduces lightning damage you take by 26...45...50%. You gain 2 Energy when you take lightning damage.

Hex Breaker.desc: Stance. (5...65...80 seconds.) The next hex against you fails and the caster takes 10...39...46 damage.

Distortion.desc: Stance. (1...4...5 second[s].) You have 75% chance to block. Block cost: you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.

Mantra of Recovery.desc: Elite Stance. (5...17...20 seconds.) Your spells recharge 33% faster.

Mantra of Persistence.desc: Stance. (5...21...25 seconds.) Illusion hexes you cast last 10...34...40% longer.

Mantra of Inscriptions.desc: Stance. (5...21...25 seconds.) Signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10...34...40% faster.

Mantra of Concentration.desc: Stance. (1...31...38 seconds.) The next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.

Mantra of Resolve.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. Prevention cost: lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

Mantra of Signets.desc: Stance. (10...34...40 seconds.) You have +3 armor for each signet. You gain 5...49...60 health each time you use a signet.

Fragility.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8...18...20 seconds). These foes take 5...17...20 damage each time they gain or lose a condition.

Inspired Enchantment.desc: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effects: you gain 3...13...15 Energy; this spell is replaced with that enchantment (20 seconds).

Inspired Hex.desc: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effects: you gain 4...9...10 Energy; this spell is replaced with that hex (20 seconds).

Power Spike.desc: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: deals 30...102...120 damage.

Power Leak.desc: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: causes 3...14...17 Energy loss.

Power Drain.desc: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: you gain 1...25...31 Energy.

Empathy.desc: Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Target foe's attacks deal 1...12...15 less damage, and that foe takes 10...46...55 damage with each attack.

Shatter Delusions.desc: Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: 15...63...75 damage to target and all adjacent foes.

Backfire.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 35...119...140 damage whenever it casts a spell.

Blackout.desc: Touch Skill. (2...5...6 seconds.) Disables skills. Your skills are disabled (5 seconds).

Diversion.desc: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next skill takes +10...47...56 seconds to recharge.

Conjure Phantasm.desc: Hex Spell. (2...13...16 seconds.) Causes -5 Health degeneration.

Illusion of Weakness.desc: Enchantment Spell. Lose 50...202...240 Health.  End effect: you gain 50...202...240 Health. Ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum.

Illusionary Weaponry.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 8...34...40 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill. Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.

Sympathetic Visage.desc: Enchantment Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.

Ignorance.desc: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot use signets.

Arcane Conundrum.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5...13...15 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. End effect: you gain 1...6...7 energy. [sic]

Illusion of Haste.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Initial effect: removes Crippled condition. End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).

Channeling.desc: Enchantment Spell. (8...46...56 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area whenever you cast a spell.

Energy Surge.desc: Elite Spell. Causes 1...8...10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage to target and nearby foes for each point of Energy lost.

Ether Feast.desc: Spell. Causes 3 Energy loss. You gain 20...56...65 Health for each point of Energy lost.

Ether Lord.desc: Hex Spell. You lose all Energy. Target foe has -1...3...3 Energy degeneration and you have +1...3...3 Energy regeneration (5...9...10 seconds).

Energy Burn.desc: Spell. Causes 1...8...10 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

Clumsiness.desc: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Also hexes adjacent foes. Interrupts next attack. Interruption effect: deals 10...76...92 damage.

Phantom Pain.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -1...3...4 Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Ethereal Burden.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower. End effect: you gain 10...16...18 Energy.

Guilt.desc: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 5...12...14 Energy. No effect unless this foe's spell targets one of your allies.

Ineptitude.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (4 seconds.)  Also hexes foes adjacent to target. Deals 30...114...135 damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds). No effect unless hexed foe attacks.

Spirit of Failure.desc: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe has 25% chance to miss. You gain 1...3...3 Energy whenever this foe misses.

Mind Wrack.desc: Hex Spell. (5...33...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. Deals 5...21...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If target foe's Energy drops to 0, it takes 15...83...100 damage and Mind Wrack ends.

Wastrel's Worry.desc: Hex Spell. (3 seconds). End effect: causes 20...84...100 damage to target and adjacent foes. No effect and ends early if target foe uses a skill.

Shame.desc: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 5...12...14 Energy. No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.

Panic.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (1...8...10 second[s]). Interrupts all other nearby foes whenever a hexed foe successfully activates a skill.

Migraine.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes -1...7...8 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.

Crippling Anguish.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe moves and attacks 50% slower and has -1...7...8 Health degeneration.

Fevered Dreams.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (10...22...25 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires. Inflicts Dazed on target foe (1...3...3 second[s]) if that foe has two or more conditions.

Soothing Images.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foe adjacent to target. (8...18...20 seconds). These foes cannot gain adrenaline.

Cry of Frustration.desc: Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and take 15...63...75 damage.

Signet of Midnight.desc: Elite Touch Signet. (15 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition. You suffer from Blindness (15 seconds).

Signet of Weariness.desc: Signet. Also affects foes near your target. Causes 3...7...8 Energy loss and inflicts Weakness (1...10...12 second[s]).

Leech Signet.desc: Signet. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: you gain 3...13...15 Energy if the action was a spell.

Signet of Humility.desc: Signet. Disables elite skill (1...13...16 second[s]). Disables your non-Mesmer skills (10 seconds).

Keystone Signet.desc: Elite Signet. (20 seconds.) Your next 0...5...6 signet[s] interrupt [sic] and deal 15...51...60 damage to other foes adjacent to your target. Initial Effect: [sic] recharges all of your other signets.

Arcane Mimicry.desc: Spell. This skill becomes target ally's elite skill (20 seconds). Cannot self-target. No effect if target's elite skill is a form.

Spirit Shackles.desc: Hex Spell. (5...17...20). Target foe loses 5 Energy whenever it attacks.

Shatter Hex.desc: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30...102...120 damage to foes near this ally.

Drain Enchantment.desc: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: you gain 8...15...17 Energy and 40...104...120 Health.

Shatter Enchantment.desc: Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals 14...83...100 damage.

Elemental Resistance.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) You have +40 armor against elemental damage. You have -24...14...12 armor against physical damage.

Physical Resistance.desc: Stance. (30...78...90 seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage. You have -24...14...12 armor against elemental damage.

Echo.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Echo becomes the next skill you use (30 seconds).

Arcane Echo.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Arcane Echo becomes the next spell you use (20 seconds). This enchantment ends if you use any skill that is not a spell.

Imagined Burden.desc: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower.

Chaos Storm.desc: Spell. Deals 5...21...25 damage and causes 0...2...2 Energy loss each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Epidemic.desc: Spell. Conditions on target foe transfer to adjacent foes.

Energy Drain.desc: Elite Spell. Causes 2...8...9 Energy loss. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

Energy Tap.desc: Spell. Causes 4...6...7 Energy loss. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

Arcane Thievery.desc: Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.

Mantra of Recall.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) End effect: you gain 10...22...25 Energy.

Animate Bone Horror.desc: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 bone horror. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Animate Bone Fiend.desc: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 bone fiend that can attack at range. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Animate Bone Minions.desc: Spell. Creates two level 0...10...12 bone minions. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Grenth's Balance.desc: Elite Spell. You gain Health equal to half the difference between you and target, and this foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose Health equal to half the difference.

Verata's Gaze.desc: Spell. Make target undead servant masterless. If it is already masterless, you become its master. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

Verata's Aura.desc: Enchantment Spell. (120...264...300 seconds.) Become master of all hostile undead servants in the area. End effect: your undead servants become masterless. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

Deathly Chill.desc: Spell. Deals 5...41...50 cold damage. Deals 5...41...50 more damage if target foe was above 50% Health.

Verata's Sacrifice.desc: Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) 10 undead allied servants gain +10 Health regeneration. Instantly recharges if you have control of 3 or fewer servants. Transfers all conditions from those servants to you.

Well of Power.desc: Elite Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...5...6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Well of Blood.desc: Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Allies in this well have +1...5...6 Health regeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Well of Suffering.desc: Well Spell. (10...26...30 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1...5...6 Health degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Well of the Profane.desc: Well Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Foes in this well lose all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. Exploits a fresh corpse. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.

Putrid Explosion.desc: Spell. Explodes a corpse, dealing 24...101...120 damage to foes near it. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Soul Feast.desc: Spell. You gain 50...234...280 Health. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Necrotic Traversal.desc: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). Affects all nearby foes. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Consume Corpse.desc: Spell. Teleport to a corpse's location. You gain 25...85...100 Health and 5...17...20 Energy. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Parasitic Bond.desc: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for 30...102...120 Health.

Soul Barbs.desc: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15...27...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on target foe.

Barbs.desc: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe takes 1...12...15 damage whenever it takes physical damage.

Shadow Strike.desc: Spell. Deals 12...41...48 damage. Steal up to 12...41...48 Health if this foe was above 50% Health.

Price of Failure.desc: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) 25% chance to miss. Target foe takes 1...37...46 damage whenever it fails to hit.

Death Nova.desc: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 26...85...100 damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.

Deathly Swarm.desc: Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals 30...78...90 cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.

Virulence.desc: Elite Spell. Inflicts Disease, Poison, and Weakness conditions (3...13...15 seconds). No effect unless this foe already had a condition.

Suffering.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (6...25...30 seconds). These foes have -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Life Siphon.desc: Hex Spell. (12...22...24 seconds.) Target foe has -1...3...3 Health degeneration. You have +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

Unholy Feast.desc: Spell. Steals 10...54...65 Health from 1...3...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

Awaken the Blood.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20...39...44 seconds.) You have +2 Blood Magic and Curses. Sacrifice 50% more Health than normal.

Desecrate Enchantments.desc: Spell. Deals 6...49...60 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals 4...17...20 more damage for each enchantment on them.

Tainted Flesh.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (20...39...44 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (3...13...15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.

Aura of the Lich.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Exploit all corpses in earshot. Animates a level 1...14...17 bone horror, plus one for each exploited corpse. You have +1 Death Magic (5...37...45 seconds).

Blood Renewal.desc: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You have +3...5...6 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...160...190.

Dark Aura.desc: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds). Deals 5...41...50 damage to adjacent foes whenever target ally sacrifices Health. Damage cost: you lose 5...17...20 Health.

Enfeebling Blood.desc: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds) on this foe and nearby foes.

Blood is Power.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) +3...5...6 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

Blood of the Master.desc: Spell. Heals your undead servants for 30...99...116. Healing cost: +2% Health sacrifice per servant healed.

Spiteful Spirit.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Deals 5...29...35 damage to target and adjacent foes whenever this foe attacks or uses a skill.

Malign Intervention.desc: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe receives 20% less from healing. If this foe dies while suffering from this hex, a level 1...14...17 masterless bone horror is summoned.

Insidious Parasite.desc: Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Steal 15...39...45 Health whenever target foe hits with an attack.

Spinal Shivers.desc: Hex Spell. (10...34...40 seconds.) Cold damage interrupts target foe's skills. Interruption cost: you lose 10...6...5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.

Wither.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Causes -2...4...4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 15...63...75 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.

Life Transfer.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (6...11...12 second). Causes -3...7...8 Health degeneration. You have +3...7...8 Health regeneration.

Mark of Subversion.desc: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal 10...76...92 Health. No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.

Soul Leech.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Steal 16...67...80 Health whenever target foe casts a spell.

Defile Flesh.desc: Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Reduces healing target foe receives by 33%. Only skills with the word "heal" in the description are affected.

Demonic Flesh.desc: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) When using a skill on a foe, deal 5...17...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

Barbed Signet.desc: Signet. Target and adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding (3...13...15 seconds).

Plague Signet.desc: Elite Signet. Transfers all conditions with 100...180...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. 50% failure chance unless Curses 5 or more.

Order of Pain.desc: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). 3...13...16 more damage whenever these party members hit with physical damage.

Faintheartedness.desc: Hex Spell. (3...13...16 seconds.) Target foe attacks 50% slower and has -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

Shadow of Fear.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (5...25...30 seconds). They attack 50% slower.

Rigor Mortis.desc: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot block.

Dark Bond.desc: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) Transfers 75% of incoming damage from you to your nearest servant.

Infuse Condition.desc: Enchantment Spell. (15...51...60 seconds.) Whenever you receive a condition, it transfers from you to your closest undead servant.

Malaise.desc: Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Deals 5...41...50 damage if target foe's Energy drops to 0. You have -1 Health degeneration. Ends if this foe's Energy drops to 0.

Rend Enchantments.desc: Spell. Removes 5...8...9 enchantments from target foe. Removal cost: you lose 55...31...25 Health for each Monk enchantment removed.

Lingering Curse.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (6...25...30 seconds.) Target and nearby foes have -0...2...3 Health degeneration and receive 20% less benefit from healing.

Strip Enchantment.desc: Spell. Removes 0...2...2 enchantment[s] from target foe. Removal effect: you steal 5...53...65 Health.

Chilblains.desc: Spell. Deals 10...37...44 cold damage to foes in the area around your target; removes 1...2...2 enchantment[s] from these foes. You are Poisoned (10 seconds).

Signet of Agony.desc: Signet. Deals 10...58...70 damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

Dark Fury.desc: Enchantment Spell. Enchants party members (5 seconds). These party members gain one strike of adrenaline each time they hit with an attack. 50% failure chance unless Blood Magic 5 or more.

Order of the Vampire.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds.) These party members steal 3...13...16 Health with each physical damage attack. Party members under another Necromancer enchantment are not affected.

Plague Sending.desc: Spell. Transfer 1...3...3 condition[s] and [its/their] remaining duration[s] from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

Mark of Pain.desc: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 10...34...40 damage to adjacent foes whenever target foe takes physical damage.

Feast of Corruption.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 16...67...80 damage to target and adjacent foes. Steal 8...34...40 Health from each hexed foe.

Taste of Death.desc: Spell. Steals 100...340...400 Health from allied undead servant.

Plague Touch.desc: Touch Skill. Transfers 1...3...3 condition[s] from yourself to target foe.

Blood Ritual.desc: Enchantment Spell. (8...13...14 seconds.) +3 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target.

Weaken Armor.desc: Spell. Also affects adjacent foes. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Windborne Speed.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...11...13 seconds.) Target ally moves 33% faster.

Gale.desc: Spell. Causes knock-down. 50% failure chance unless Air Magic 5 or more.

Whirlwind.desc: Spell. Hits foes adjacent to you. Deals 15...63...75 cold damage. Causes knock-down to attacking foes. Strikes nearby instead of adjacent if Overcast.

Elemental Attunement.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (25...53...60 seconds.) Your elemental attributes are increased by +1...2...2. You gain 50% of the Energy cost of any Air, Earth, Fire, and Water Magic skills you use.

Armor of Earth.desc: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You have +24...53...60 armor. You move 50...21...14% slower.

Kinetic Armor.desc: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) You have +20...68...80 armor. Renewal bonus: cast a spell.

Eruption.desc: Spell. Deals 10...34...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds).

Magnetic Aura.desc: Enchantment Spell. (1...4...5 second[s].) Block the next attack against you and reflect 10...42...50 damage to the attacker. If you are Overcast, enchant party members in earshot.

Earth Attunement.desc: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use an Earth Magic skill.

Earthquake.desc: Spell. Deals 26...85...100 earth damage. Also hits foes near target. Causes knock-down.

Stoning.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 45...93...105 earth damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is Weakened.

Stone Daggers.desc: Spell. Two projectiles: each deals 8...28...33 earth damage. If Overcast, cause Bleeding for 1...4...5 second[s].

Grasping Earth.desc: Hex Spell. Hexes foes near you for (5...17...20 seconds). These foes move 50% slower.

Aftershock.desc: Spell. Deals 26...85...100 earth damage to nearby foes. Deals 10...56...68 more earth damage to knocked down foes.

Ward Against Elements.desc: Ward Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor against elemental damage. Spirits are unaffected.

Ward Against Melee.desc: Ward Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have a 50% chance to block melee attacks. Allied spirits are not affected.

Ward Against Foes.desc: Ward Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Foes in this ward move 50% slower.

Ether Prodigy.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) You have +6 Energy regeneration. End effect: lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have. Lose all enchantments.

Incendiary Bonds.desc: Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: deals 20...68...80 fire damage and inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]) to foes near your target. Also triggers if foe dies.

Aura of Restoration.desc: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

Ether Renewal.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3...4 Energy and 5...17...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

Conjure Flame.desc: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...17...20 fire damage. No effect unless your weapon deals fire damage.

Inferno.desc: Spell. Deals 30...114...135 fire damage to foes adjacent to you.

Fire Attunement.desc: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Fire Magic skill.

Mind Burn.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 15...51...60 fire damage. If you have more energy than target foe, deals 15...51...60 more fire damage and inflicts Burning (1...8...10 second[s]). Also hits adjacent foes.

Fireball.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 7...91...112 fire damage to target and adjacent foes.

Meteor.desc: Spell. Deals 7...91...112 fire damage and causes knock-down. Also hits foes adjacent to target foe.

Flame Burst.desc: Spell. Deals 15...99...120 fire damage to all foes near you.

Rodgort's Invocation.desc: Spell. Deals 15...99...120 fire damage. Also affects foes near your target. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]).

Mark of Rodgort.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (10...30...35 seconds). Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...4 second[s]) when these foes take fire damage.

Immolate.desc: Spell. Deals 20...64...75 fire damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]).

Meteor Shower.desc: Spell. Deals 7...91...112 fire damage and causes knock-down every 3 seconds (9 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Phoenix.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 10...50...60 fire damage to target and nearby foes. Heals allies for 20...68...80 if you are Overcast.

Flare.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 20...56...65 fire damage. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

Lava Font.desc: Spell. Deals 5...41...50 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location. If Overcast, range increased to nearby.

Searing Heat.desc: Spell. Deals 10...34...40 fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds).

Fire Storm.desc: Spell. Deals 5...29...35 fire damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Glyph of Elemental Power.desc: Glyph. (25 seconds.) Boosts your elemental attributes by +2 for your next 10 spells.

Glyph of Energy.desc: Elite Glyph. Your next 1...3...3 spell[s] do[es] not cause Overcast and cost[s] 10...22...25 less Energy. Gain 1...2...2 to all elemental attributes.

Glyph of Lesser Energy.desc: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells cost 10...16...18 less Energy.

Glyph of Concentration.desc: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and is unaffected by the Dazed condition.

Glyph of Sacrifice.desc: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly but takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. Ends if you use a non-spell skill.

Glyph of Renewal.desc: Elite Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell recharges instantly.

Rust.desc: Hex Spell. Deals 10...58...70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. Hexes target and adjacent foes (5...17...20 seconds). Doubles signet activation time. Interrupts and disables signets for 1...8...10 second[s] if you are Overcast.

Lightning Surge.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: deals 14...83...100 lightning damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Cracked Armor (5...17...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

Armor of Frost.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10...29...34 seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.

Conjure Frost.desc: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +5...17...20 cold damage. No effect unless your weapon deals cold damage.

Water Attunement.desc: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Water Magic skill.

Mind Freeze.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 10...50...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...50...60 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...4...5 second[s]).

Ice Prison.desc: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower.

Ice Spikes.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (2...5...6 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals 20...68...80 cold damage.

Escape.desc: Elite Stance. (1...7...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

Practiced Stance.desc: Elite Stance. (20...32...35 seconds.) Your preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...126...150% longer.

Whirling Defense.desc: Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. Deals 5...10...11 damage to adjacent foes whenever you block a projectile attack.

Melandru's Resilience.desc: Elite Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You have +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex on you.

Dryder's Defenses.desc: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block and +34...55...60 armor against elemental damage.

Lightning Reflexes.desc: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

Tiger's Fury.desc: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. Disables your non-attack skills (5 seconds).

Storm Chaser.desc: Stance. (8...18...20 seconds.) You move 25% faster and gain 1...4...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.

Serpent's Quickness.desc: Stance. (15...27...30 seconds.) Your skills recharge 33% faster. Ends if your Health drops below 50%.

Dust Trap.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 10...22...25 damage every second (5 seconds). Inflicts Blindness condition (3...7...8 seconds) every second (5 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Barbed Trap.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 7...20...23 piercing damage. Inflicts Crippled and Bleeding conditions (3...21...25 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Flame Trap.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...17...20 fire damage every second (3 seconds). Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]). Easily interrupted.

Healing Spring.desc: Trap. (10 seconds.) Affects adjacent allies. Heals for 15...51...60 every 2 seconds. Easily interrupted.

Spike Trap.desc: Elite Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Every second, (for 2 seconds), this trap deals 10...34...40 piercing damage, causes knockdown, and inflicts Crippled condition (3...21...25 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Winter.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Converts elemental damage to cold damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Winnowing.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Increases physical damage by +4 for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Edge of Extinction.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Deals 14...43...50 damage to creatures in its range whenever a creature of the same type dies. Does not affect spirits. No damage to creatures above 90% Health.

Greater Conflagration.desc: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Converts physical damage to fire damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Conflagration.desc: Nature Ritual.  Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). All arrows deal fire damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Fertile Season.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Creatures in range have +50...130...150 maximum health and +8 armor. Does not affect spirits.

Symbiosis.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Creatures in range have +27...125...150 maximum health for each enchantment on them. Does not affect spirits.

Primal Echoes.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Signets cost 10 energy for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Predatory Season.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Creatures in range receive 20% less from healing. Creatures gain 5 health each time they hit with an attack. Does not affect spirits.

Frozen Soil.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit. (30...78...90 second lifespan). Creatures in range cannot activate resurrection skills. Does not affect spirits.

Favorable Winds.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Arrows move twice as fast and hit for +6 damage for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Energizing Wind.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...5...6 spirit (1...25...31 second[s] lifespan). Skills cost 15 less energy (minimum cost 10 energy) and recharge 25% slower for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Quickening Zephyr.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Skills cost 30% more Energy and recharge twice as fast for creatures in range. Does not affect spirits.

Nature's Renewal.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). For creatures in range, enchantments and Hexes [sic] take twice as long to cast and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. Does not affect spirits.

Muddy Terrain.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). Creatures in range have 10% slower movement: also negates speed boosts. Does not affect spirits.

Mark of Insecurity.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...21...25 seconds.) Causes 1...3...3 Health degeneration. Enchantments and stances expire 30...70...80% faster on target foe. Disables your non-Assassin skills (10 seconds).

Disrupting Dagger.desc: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 10...30...35 earth damage. Interrupts a skill.

Deadly Paradox.desc: Stance. (5...13...15 seconds.) Your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster. Disables your attack skills (10 seconds).

Jaundiced Gaze.desc: Enchantment Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: your next enchantment casts 0...1...1 second[s] faster and costs 1...8...10 less Energy. (1...12...15 second[s])

Wail of Doom.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (1...3...4 second[s].) Target foe's attributes are 0.

Gaze of Contempt.desc: Spell. Removes target foe's enchantments. No effect unless this foe has more than 50% Health.

Viper's Defense.desc: Spell. Inflict Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds) on all adjacent foes and Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

Return.desc: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...7...8 seconds) on all foes adjacent to you. You Shadow Step to target ally's location. Cannot self-target.

Aura of Displacement.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location.

Generous Was Tsungrai.desc: Item Spell.  (15...51...60 seconds.)  You have +50...122...140 maximum Health.  Drop effect: you gain 100...244...280 Health.

Mighty Was Vorizun.desc: Item Spell. (15...51...60 seconds.) You have +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.

Death Blossom.desc: Dual Attack. Deals +20...40...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. Must follow an off-hand attack.

Twisting Fangs.desc: Dual Attack. Deals +10...18...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding and Deep Wound conditions (5...17...20 seconds). Must follow an off-hand attack.

Horns of the Ox.desc: Dual Attack. Deals +1...9...11 damage. Causes knock-down if the target foe is not adjacent to any of its allies. Must follow an off-hand attack.

Falling Spider.desc: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +15...31...35 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.

Black Lotus Strike.desc: Lead Attack. Deals +10...27...31 damage. You gain 5...11...13 Energy if target foe is hexed.

Fox Fangs.desc: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

Moebius Strike.desc: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Recharges all your other attack skills if target foe's Health is below 50%. Must follow a dual attack.

Jagged Strike.desc: Lead Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Unsuspecting Strike.desc: Lead Attack. Deals +19...29...31 damage. Deals 15...63...75 more damage if target foe's Health is above 90%.

Entangling Asp.desc: Spell. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). Must follow a lead attack.

Mark of Death.desc: Hex Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) Target foe receives 33% less from healing.

Iron Palm.desc: Touch Skill. Deals 5...41...50 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is hexed or has a condition. Counts as a lead attack.

Resilient Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (3...10...12 seconds.) +1...5...6 Health regeneration and +24 armor. No effect unless target ally is hexed or has a condition.

Blind Was Mingson.desc: Item Spell. (15...51...60 seconds.) Drop effect: inflicts Blindness condition (3...7...8 seconds) on all nearby foes.

Grasping Was Kuurong.desc: Elite Item Spell. (15...51...60 seconds.) Drop effect: deal 15...63...75 damage and knocks-down all nearby foes.

Vengeful Was Khanhei.desc: Elite Item Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) You steal 5...29...35 Health from every foe that hits you with an attack.

Flesh of My Flesh.desc: Spell. Resurrect target party member (half your current Health and 5...17...20% Energy). Lose half your Health.

Splinter Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) Attacks deal 5...41...50 damage to 3 [sic] adjacent foes. Ends after 1...4...5 attack[s].

Weapon of Warding.desc: Weapon Spell. (3...7...8 seconds.) +2...4...4 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block.

Wailing Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (3...8...9 seconds.) Attacks interrupt attacking foes.

Nightmare Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (12 seconds.) Target ally's attacks steal 10...42...50 Health but deal 10...42...50 less damage. Ends after 3 attacks.

Beguiling Haze.desc: Elite Spell. You Shadow Step to this foe. Inflicts Dazed condition (3...8...9 seconds).

Enduring Toxin.desc: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes -1...4...5 Health degeneration. Renewal: if the target foe is moving when this hex ends.

Shroud of Silence.desc: Elite Touch Hex Spell. (1...3...3 second[s].) Target foe cannot cast spells. Your spells are disabled for 15 seconds.

Expose Defenses.desc: Hex Spell. (1...9...11 second[s].) Target foe cannot block your attacks.

Power Leech.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Interrupt a spell or a chant. Interruption effect: steal 5...13...15 Energy whenever target foe casts a spell (10 seconds).

Arcane Languor.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (1...8...10 second[s].) Target foe's spells cause 10 Overcast.

Animate Vampiric Horror.desc: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to the damage it deals. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Cultist's Fervor.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds plus 3 seconds more for every rank of Soul Reaping.) Your Necromancer spells cost 1...5...6 less Energy. You suffer from Bleeding (10 seconds) each time you cast a Necromancer spell.

Reaper's Mark.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Causes -1...4...5 Health degeneration. You gain 5...13...15 Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.

Shatterstone.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Initial effect: deals 25...85...100 cold damage. End effect: deals 25...85...100 cold damage to target and all nearby foes.

Protector's Defense.desc: Skill. (5...10...11 seconds.) Allies adjacent to you have 75% chance to block. Ends if you move.

Run as One.desc: Stance. (5...13...15 seconds.) You and your pet move 25% faster.

Defiant Was Xinrae.desc: Elite Item Spell. (15...51...60 seconds.) You cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. Drop effect: steal 5...41...50 Health from nearby foes.

Lyssa's Aura.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have +0...4...5 Energy regeneration. Renewal: every time you cast a spell on an enemy.

Shadow Refuge.desc: Enchantment Spell. (6 seconds.) You have +5...9...10 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...88...100 if you are attacking.

Scorpion Wire.desc: Half Range Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe and cause knock-down the next time this foe is more than 100' away from you.

Mirrored Stance.desc: Hex Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) You enter any stance used by target foe.

Discord.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 30...94...110 damage. No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.

Well of Weariness.desc: Well Spell. (10...46...55 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1 Energy degeneration. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Vampiric Spirit.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal 5...41...50 Health from target foe. You have +5...9...10 Health regeneration (10 seconds).

Depravity.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes 1...4...5 Energy loss whenever target foe casts a spell. One foe near your target also loses Energy.

Icy Veins.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) Deals 20...92...110 cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals 10...74...90 cold damage.

Weaken Knees.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (1...13...16 second[s].) Target foe has -1...3...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...9...10 damage while moving.

Burning Speed.desc: Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You move 30...42...45% faster. You suffer from Burning (7 seconds). End effect: inflicts Burning condition (3...8...9 seconds) on adjacent foes.

Lava Arrows.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 20...56...65 fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.

Bed of Coals.desc: Spell. Deals 5...24...29 fire damage each second (5 seconds) to location of target foe. Hits foes adjacent to your target. Inflicts Burning condition (3...6...7 seconds) on knocked down foes.

Shadow Form.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...18...21 seconds.) Enemy spells cannot target you. Gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than 5...21...25 damage with a single skill or attack.

Siphon Strength.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe deals -5...41...50 attack damage. You have +33% chance to land a critical hit on this foe.

Vile Miasma.desc: Hex Spell. Causes -1...4...5 Health degeneration (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...54...65 cold damage. Hex is only applied if target foe has a condition.

Ray of Judgment.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 5...37...45 holy damage and inflicts Burning (1...3...3 second[s]) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Primal Rage.desc: Elite Stance. (1...12...15 second[s].) You attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. You take double damage.

Animate Flesh Golem.desc: Elite Spell. Creates a level 3...21...25 flesh golem which leaves a fresh corpse when it dies. Exploits a fresh corpse. You can have only one flesh golem at a time.

Reckless Haste.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (6...11...12 seconds). These foes have 50% chance to miss, but attack 25% faster.

Blood Bond.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to your target (3...10...12 seconds). Allies hitting these foes gain 5...17...20 health. If any of these foes dies while hexed, adjacent allies are healed for 20...84...100.

Ride the Lightning.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 10...58...70 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes (1...4...5 second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

Energy Boon.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) Maximum Health for you and target ally is increased by 1...3...3 for each point of maximum Energy.  Initial effect: Both gain 1...10...12 Energy.  You gain +1 Energy for every 2 points of Energy Storage.

Dwayna's Sorrow.desc: Enchantment Spell. Enchants allies near your target (30 seconds). Your party is healed for 5...41...50 whenever one of these allies dies.

\"Retreat!\".desc: Shout. (5...10...11 seconds.) Party members in earshot move 33% faster. No effect unless there are dead allies within earshot.

Poisoned Heart.desc: Spell. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...13...15 seconds) to adjacent foes. You are also Poisoned.

Fetid Ground.desc: Spell. Deals 15...55...65 cold damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

Arc Lightning.desc: Spell. Deals 5...33...40 lightning damage. Deals 15...71...85 lightning damage to two nearby foes if you are Overcast. 25% armor penetration.

Gust.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) You and target ally move 33% faster. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for 15...59...70 cold damage.  Attacking or moving foes are knocked down.

Churning Earth.desc: Spell. Deals 10...34...40 earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Causes knock-down to foes moving faster than normal.

Liquid Flame.desc: Spell. Deals 7...91...112 fire damage. Deals 7...91...112 fire damage to nearby foes if target was attacking or casting.

Steam.desc: Spell. Deals 20...52...60 cold damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (5...9...10 seconds) if target foe is Burning.

Boon Signet.desc: Elite Signet. Heals for 20...68...80. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer [sic] spell that targets an ally heals for +20...68...80 Health.

Reverse Hex.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) Removes one hex from target ally. The next damage this ally takes is reduced by 5...41...50. No effect unless this ally is hexed.

Lacerating Chop.desc: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked-down.

Fierce Blow.desc: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (1...7...8 second[s]) if target foe is Weakened.

Sun and Moon Slash.desc: Sword Attack. You attack target foe twice. Unblockable.

Splinter Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +3...13...15 damage. Deals 5...53...65 damage to adjacent foes if blocked.

Melandru's Shot.desc: Elite Bow Attack. Inflicts Bleeding (5...21...25 seconds). Deals +10...22...25 damage and inflicts Crippled (5...13...15 seconds) if target foe was moving or knocked down.

Snare.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Dancing Daggers.desc: Half Range Spell. Three projectiles: each deals 5...29...35 earth damage. Counts as a lead attack.

Conjure Nightmare.desc: Hex Spell. (2...13...16 seconds.) Causes -8 Health degeneration.

Signet of Disruption.desc: Signet. Interrupts a spell. Can interrupt any skill if target foe is hexed. Interruption effect: deals 10...43...51 damage.

Ravenous Gaze.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 15...27...30 damage and steals 15...27...30 Health from target and nearby foes.

Order of Apostasy.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members (5 seconds). These party members remove one enchantment when they deal physical damage. Removal cost: for each Monk enchantment, you lose 25...17...15% maximum Health.

Oppressive Gaze.desc: Spell. Deals 10...26...30 damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Poison and Weakness (3...10...12 second) on foes suffering from a condition.

Lightning Hammer.desc: Spell. Deals 10...82...100 lightning damage. Applies Cracked Armor (5...17...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration.

Vapor Blade.desc: Spell. Deals 15...111...135 cold damage. Half damage if target foe is enchanted.

Healing Light.desc: Elite Spell. Heals for 40...88...100. You gain 1...3...3 Energy if target ally is enchanted.

\"Coward!\".desc: Elite Shout. Causes knock-down if target foe is moving.

Pestilence.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). When any creature in range dies, conditions on this creature spread to any creature in the area with a condition. Spirits are not affected.

Shadowsong.desc: Binding Ritual.  Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30-second lifespan).  Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and inflict Blindness condition (1...5...6 second[s]).

Signet of Shadows.desc: Signet. Deals 5...29...35 damage. Deals 15...51...60 more damage if target foe is Blinded.

Lyssa's Balance.desc: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. No effect if you have more enchantments than this foe.

Visions of Regret.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take 15...39...45 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...41...50 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

Illusion of Pain.desc: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Causes -3...9...10 Health degeneration and target foe takes 3...9...10 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for 36...103...120.

Stolen Speed.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes (1...8...10 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells cast by you or your allies have -50% casting times.

Ether Signet.desc: Signet. You gain 10...18...20 Energy. No effect unless you have less than 5...9...10 Energy.

Signet of Disenchantment.desc: Signet. Removes one enchantment. You lose all Energy.

Vocal Minority.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near target (5...17...20 seconds). These foes cannot use shouts or chants.

Searing Flames.desc: Elite Spell. Hits foes near your target. Deals 10...82...100 fire damage to foes already Burning. Inflicts Burning condition (1...6...7 seconds) to foes not Burning.

Shield Guardian.desc: Enchantment Spell. (1...3...4 second[s]). Party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block attacks. Block effect: Allies in earshot are healed for 10...34...40, and Shield Guardian ends.

Restful Breeze.desc: Enchantment Spell. (8...16...18 seconds.) +10 Health regeneration. Ends if target ally attacks or uses a skill.

Signet of Rejuvenation.desc: Signet. Heals for 15...63...75. Heals for 15...63...75 more if target ally is casting a spell or attacking.

Whirling Axe.desc: Elite Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and removes a stance. Unblockable.

Forceful Blow.desc: Elite Hammer Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage. Remove target foe's stance. Inflicts Weakness condition (5...17...20 seconds). Unblockable.

\"None Shall Pass!\".desc: Shout. Knocks down all nearby moving foes. Recharges 1...7...8 second[s] faster for each affected foe (maximum 25 seconds).

Quivering Blade.desc: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Inflicts Dazed condition (5 seconds) if target foe was moving.

Seeking Arrows.desc: Preparation. (3...12...14 seconds.) Your arrows are unblockable. Ends if you fail to hit.

Overload.desc: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes -1...3...3 Health degeneration. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all adjacent foes take 15...63...75 damage.

Images of Remorse.desc: Hex Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) Causes -1...3...3 Health degeneration. Initial effect: 10...44...52 damage if target foe is attacking.

Shared Burden.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...17...20 seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

Soul Bind.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...68...80 damage. Ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.

Blood of the Aggressor.desc: Spell. Steal 5...37...45 Health. Inflicts Weakness (3...10...12 seconds) if target foe was attacking.

Icy Prism.desc: Spell. Deals 15...63...75 cold damage. Deals +[sic]15...63...75 cold damage to other nearby foes if target has a Water Magic hex.

Furious Axe.desc: Axe Attack. Deals +5...29...35 damage. Gives you 3 strikes of adrenaline if blocked.

Auspicious Blow.desc: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and you gain 3...7...8 Energy. Unblockable if target foe is Weakened.

\"On Your Knees!\".desc: Shout. Recharges all your stances if you are adjacent to a knocked-down foe. You lose all adrenaline.

Dragon Slash.desc: Elite Sword Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. You gain 1...4...5 strike[s] of adrenaline if it hits.

Marauder's Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Your non-attack skills are disabled (10 seconds) if this attack hits.

Focused Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. Your other attack skills are disabled (5...3...3 seconds) if this attack hits.

Spirit Rift.desc: Spell. After 3 seconds, affects foes adjacent to target's initial location. Deals 25...105...125 lightning damage and inflicts Cracked Armor (1...16...20 second[s]).

Union.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10...12 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

Tranquil Was Tanasen.desc: Elite Item Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) You have +10...22...25 armor. You cannot be interrupted.

Consume Soul.desc: Elite Spell. Steals 5...49...60 Health. Deal 25...105...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of target foe.

Spirit Light.desc: Spell. Heals for 60...156...180. You don't sacrifice Health if you are within earshot of any spirits.

Lamentation.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...17...20 seconds). Causes -0...2...3 Health degeneration. Initial effect: Deals 10...42...50 damage to these foes if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.

Rupture Soul.desc: Spell. Destroys target allied spirit. Deals 50...122...140 lightning damage and inflicts Blindness condition (3...10...12 seconds) to nearby foes.

Spirit to Flesh.desc: Touch Spell. Destroys target touched allied spirit. Heals nearby allies for 30...198...240.

Spirit Burn.desc: Spell. Deals 5...41...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...4...5 second[s]) if you are within earshot of a spirit.

Destruction.desc: Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 5...21...25 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).

Dissonance.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10...12 spirit (10...22...25 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and interrupt actions.

Disenchantment.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10...12 spirit (10...30...35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and remove one enchantment.

Recall.desc: Enchantment Spell. End effect: Shadow Step to target ally. Cannot self-target and disables all of your skills for 10 seconds when it ends.

Sharpen Daggers.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...25...30 seconds.) Your dagger attacks inflict the Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds).

Shameful Fear.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...17...20 damage each second while moving, but moves 10% faster.

Shadow Shroud.desc: Elite Hex Spell. (3...8...9 seconds.) Target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.

Shadow of Haste.desc: Stance. (10...34...40 seconds.) You move 15% faster. End effect: return to your original location.

Auspicious Incantation.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Your next spell gives you 110...182...200% of its Energy cost. That spell takes 10...6...5 seconds longer to recharge.

Power Return.desc: Spell. Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: target foe gains 10...6...5 Energy.

Complicate.desc: Spell. Interrupt a skill. Interruption effect: disables interrupted skill (+5...11...12 seconds) for target foe and all foes in the area.

Shatter Storm.desc: Elite Spell. Removes all enchantments. Removal cost: Shatter Storm is disabled for +7 seconds for each enchantment removed.

Unnatural Signet.desc: Signet. Deals 15...63...75 damage. Deals 5...41...50 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

Rising Bile.desc: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) End effect: deals 1...5...6 damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect. Also damages other foes in the area.

Envenom Enchantments.desc: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Inflicts Poisoned condition (3...9...10 seconds for each remaining enchantment on that foe).

Shockwave.desc: Elite Spell. Foes in the area take 15...51...60 earth damage and are Weakened (1...8...10 second[s]). Nearby foes also take +15...51...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor (1...8...10 second[s]). Adjacent foes also take +15...51...60 earth damage and are Blinded (1...8...10 second[s]).

Ward of Stability.desc: Ward Spell. (10...22...25 seconds.) Allies in this ward cannot be knocked-down. Allied spirits are not affected.

Meekness.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes in the area of target (5...25...30 seconds). These foes attack 50% slower.

Healing Ring.desc: Spell. Heals adjacent allies and foes for 30...150...180. The caster is not healed.

Renew Life.desc: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (50% Health and 5...17...20% Energy). Heals allies within earshot for 55...115...130.

Doom.desc: Spell. Deals 10...34...40 lightning damage (maximum 135) for each of your recharging binding rituals.

Wielder's Boon.desc: Spell. Heals for 15...51...60. Heals for 15...63...75 more if this ally is under a Weapon [sic] spell.

Soothing.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10...12 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Building adrenaline takes twice as long for foes within range.

Weapon of Quickening.desc: Elite Weapon Spell. (5...21...25 seconds.) Spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.

Signet of Rage.desc: Signet. Deals 5...41...50 holy damage. Deals 5...9...10 more holy damage for each of target foe's adrenaline skills.

Extend Conditions.desc: Elite Spell. Spread all conditions from target foe to foes near your target. Those [sic] durations of those conditions are increased by 5...81...100% (maximum 30 seconds).

Hypochondria.desc: Spell. Transfer all conditions from foes in the area to target foe.

Wastrel's Demise.desc: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take 1...8...10 damage. Foes take +1...8...10 damage each second this hex is in effect.  Ends early if target foe uses a skill.

Spiritual Pain.desc: Spell. Deals 15...63...75 damage. Deals 25...105...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

Drain Delusions.desc: Spell. Removes one Mesmer hex from target foe. Causes 1...4...5 Energy loss. You gain 4 Energy for each point lost. No effect unless a hex was removed.

Persistence of Memory.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Your interrupted spells recharge instantly.

Symbols of Inspiration.desc: Elite Skill. (1...25...31 seconds.) This skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.

Symbolic Celerity.desc: Enchantment Spell. (36...55...60 seconds.) Your signets use your Fast Casting attribute.

Frustration.desc: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes 5...41...50 damage whenever interrupted. Deals double damage on skill interrupt.

Tease.desc: Elite Spell. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: also interrupts other foes in the area, and you steal 0...4...5 Energy from all foes in the area.

Ether Phantom.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -1 Energy degeneration. Causes 1...4...5 Energy loss if this hex ends early.

Web of Disruption.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

Enchanter's Conundrum.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Causes 100...180...200% slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...82...100 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

Signet of Illusions.desc: Elite Signet. Your next 1...3...3 spell[s] use your Illusion attribute instead of its normal attribute.

Discharge Enchantment.desc: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. 20...44...50% faster recharge if that foe was hexed.

Hex Eater Vortex.desc: Elite Spell. Removes one hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 30...78...90 damage and removes one enchantment from foes near this ally.

Mirror of Disenchantment.desc: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

Simple Thievery.desc: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: If a skill was interrupted, that skill is disabled and Simple Thievery becomes that skill (5...17...20 seconds).

Animate Shambling Horror.desc: Spell. Creates a level 1...14...17 shambling horror. When the shambling horror dies, it is replaced by a level 0...12...15 jagged horror that causes Bleeding with each of its attacks. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Order of Undeath.desc: Elite Spell. (5 seconds.) Your undead servants deal +3...13...16 damage. You lose 2% of your maximum Health whenever your servants hit.

Putrid Flesh.desc: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Inflicts Diseased condition (5...13...15 seconds) to foes near this servant.

Feast for the Dead.desc: Spell. Destroys one of your undead servants. Heals your servants for 10...82...100.

Jagged Bones.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) When target undead servant dies, it is replaced by a level 0...12...15 jagged horror that inflicts Bleeding with attacks.

Contagion.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you gain a condition, all foes in the area gain that same condition. You sacrifice 10...6...5% maximum Health each time this happens.

Ulcerous Lungs.desc: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (10...22...25 seconds). Causes -4 Health degeneration to any of these foes that are Bleeding. Inflicts Bleeding (3...13...15 seconds) whenever these foes use a shout or chant.

Pain of Disenchantment.desc: Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...3...3 enchantment[s]. Removal effect: that foe and all adjacent foes lose 10...82...100 Health.

Mark of Fury.desc: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Allies hitting target foe gain 0...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor (1...12...15 second[s].)

Corrupt Enchantment.desc: Elite Hex Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: -1...7...8 Health degeneration (10 seconds).

Signet of Sorrow.desc: Signet. Deals 15...63...75 damage. Recharges instantly if target foe is near a corpse or has a dead pet.

Signet of Suffering.desc: Elite Signet. You Bleed for 6 seconds.  Applies Bleeding (2...13...16 seconds) to the target of your next Necromancer skill.

Signet of Lost Souls.desc: Signet. You gain 10...82...100 Health and 1...8...10 Energy if target foe is below 50% Health.

Well of Darkness.desc: Well Spell. (5...41...50 seconds.) Hexed foes in this well have 50% chance to miss. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Blinding Surge.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 5...41...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...7...8 seconds) on target and adjacent foes. 25% armor penetration. If target was attacking, also hits adjacent foes and deals 50% more damage.

Chilling Winds.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) The next water hex on target foe lasts 25...85...100% longer. Initial effect: 30...54...60 cold damage. Also strikes adjacent.

Lightning Bolt.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 5...41...50 lightning damage. Deals 5...41...50 more lightning damage if target foe is moving. 25% armor penetration.

Storm Djinn's Haste.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10...22...25 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Lose 1 Energy each second while moving.

Stone Striker.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...25...30 seconds.) Converts elemental and physical damage you take or deal to earth damage.

Sandstorm.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 10...26...30 earth damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes near target foe's initial location. Hits attacking foes for 10...26...30 more earth damage each second.

Stone Sheath.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Gives you and target ally +1...24...30 armor and immunity to critical hits.  Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for 15...59...70 earth damage and are Weakened (5...17...20 seconds).

Ebon Hawk.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 10...70...85 earth damage and inflicts Weakness condition (5...13...15 seconds).

Stoneflesh Aura.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Reduces damage you take by 1...25...31, and you are immune to critical hits.

Glyph of Restoration.desc: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells heal you for 30...90...105, and you are healed for 150...350...400% of the Energy cost of each spell.

Ether Prism.desc: Elite Skill. (3 seconds.) All damage you take is reduced by 75%. End effect: gain 5...17...20 Energy.

Master of Magic.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (1...49...61 second[s]). Your elemental attributes are set to 8...13...14 and elemental spells return 30% of their Energy cost.

Glowing Gaze.desc: Spell. Deals 5...41...50 fire damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Burning.

Savannah Heat.desc: Elite Spell. Deals 5...17...20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.

Flame Djinn's Haste.desc: Enchantment Spell. (8...13...14 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Initial effect: deals 15...99...120 fire damage to foes adjacent to you. If you damage a foe with this spell, it recharges 50% faster.

Freezing Gust.desc: Hex Spell. Deals 20...68...80 cold damage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic. Otherwise, this foe moves 66% slower (1...4...5 second[s]).

Judge's Intervention.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage. Negation effect: deals 30...150...180 holy damage to one foe near target ally.

Supportive Spirit.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...19...23 seconds.) Heals for 5...29...35 whenever target ally takes damage while knocked-down.

Watchful Healing.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target ally has +1...3...4 Health regeneration and gains 30...102...120 Health if this enchantment ends early.

Healer's Boon.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...46...55 seconds.) Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more.

Healer's Covenant.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Your Healing Prayers spells cost 1...3...3 less Energy. These spells heal for 25% less.

Balthazar's Pendulum.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) Causes knock-down to the next foe attempting to knock-down target ally.

Words of Comfort.desc: Spell. Heals for 15...51...60. Heals for 15...39...45 more if target ally has a condition.

Light of Deliverance.desc: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5...57...70.

Scourge Enchantment.desc: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15...63...75 damage to anyone casting an enchantment on target foe.

Shield of Absorption.desc: Enchantment Spell. (3...6...7 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage by 5 each time target ally takes damage.

Reversal of Damage.desc: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Negates the next damage and hits the source for that same amount (maximum 5...61...75).

Mending Touch.desc: Touch Spell. Removes two conditions. Heals for 15...51...60 for each condition removed.

Critical Chop.desc: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Interrupts an action if you land a critical hit.

Agonizing Chop.desc: Axe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Interrupts an action if target foe has a Deep Wound.

Flail.desc: Stance. (1...12...15 second[s].) You attack 33% faster. You move 33% slower.

Charging Strike.desc: Elite Stance. (1...8...10 second[s].) You move 33% faster and deal +10...34...40 damage with your next melee hit. Ends when you hit or if you use a skill.

Headbutt.desc: Elite Touch Skill. Deals 40...88...100 damage. You are Dazed (5...17...20 seconds).

Lion's Comfort.desc: Skill. You are healed for 50...98...110 and gain 0...2...3 strike[s] of adrenaline. Disables your signets (12 seconds).

Rage of the Ntouka.desc: Elite Skill. You gain 1...6...7 adrenaline. For 10 seconds, adrenal skills have a 5 second recharge when used.

Mokele Smash.desc: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and you gain 2 strikes of adrenaline.

Overbearing Smash.desc: Hammer Attack. Deals +1...16...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, they are Dazed (1...7...8 second[s]).

Signet of Stamina.desc: Signet. You have +50...250...300 maximum Health. Ends if you hit with an attack.

\"You're All Alone!\".desc: Elite Shout. Inflicts Cripple and Weakness conditions (8 seconds). No effect if target foe is near one of its allies.

Burst of Aggression.desc: Stance. (2...8...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster. End effect: lose all adrenaline.

Enraging Charge.desc: Stance. (5...13...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Gain +0...2...3 adrenaline on your next melee attack. Ends after your next hit.

Crippling Slash.desc: Elite Sword Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...13...15 seconds) and Bleeding condition (10...22...25 seconds).

Barbarous Slice.desc: Sword Attack. Deals +5...25...30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds) if you are not in a stance.

Prepared Shot.desc: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. You gain 1...7...9 Energy if you have a preparation active.

Burning Arrow.desc: Elite Bow Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...6...7 seconds).

Arcing Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. Unblockable. This arrow moves 50% slower.

Crossfire.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Unblockable if target foe is near any of your allies.

Barbed Arrows.desc: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your arrows inflict Bleeding condition (3...13...15 seconds). You have -40 armor while activating this skill.

Scavenger's Focus.desc: Elite Skill. (10 seconds). You gain 3...10...12 Energy if you strike a foe who has a condition.

Toxicity.desc: Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan.) Poisoned or Diseased creatures within range have -2 Health degeneration.

Quicksand.desc: Elite Nature Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). Creatures lose 1 Energy each time they attack or use a skill. Does not affect spirits.

Storm's Embrace.desc: Stance. (10 seconds.) You move 25% faster. Renewal: whenever you take elemental damage.

Trapper's Speed.desc: Stance. (5...25...30 seconds.) Your traps recharge 25% faster and activate 25% faster. Ends if you hit with an attack.

Renewing Surge.desc: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Deals 2...10...12 damage each second. End effect: You gain 1...7...8 energy.

Banishing Strike.desc: Melee Attack. Deals 10...50...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

Mystic Sweep.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +3...10...12 damage. Deals an additional +3...10...12 damage if you are enchanted.

Eremite's Attack.desc: Scythe Attack.  Deals +1...8...10 damage and removes a Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect:  Deals +1...8...10 damage and strikes all adjacent foes.

Reap Impurities.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +3...13...15 damage. Struck foes lose 1 condition. Removal Effect: all foes adjacent to those struck take 10...34...40 holy damage.
