Victorious Sweep.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +5...21...25 damage. You gain 30...70...80 Health for each foe you hit that has less Health than you.

Irresistible Sweep.desc: Scythe Attack. Deals +3...13...15 damage. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance, deals +3...13...15 additional damage.

Pious Assault.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +10...18...20 damage. Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal Effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...26...30 damage.

Mystic Twister.desc: Spell. Deals 10...50...60 cold damage to all nearby foes. Deals 10...50...60 more cold damage if you are enchanted.

Grenth's Fingers.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal cold damage. Initial effect: hits nearby foes for 10...34...40 cold damage. End effect: transfers 1...2...2 condition[s] to all nearby foes.

Aura of Thorns.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...7...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

Balthazar's Rage.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Initial Effect:  Inflicts burning (1...3...3 second[s]) on nearby foes.  End effect: gain 1...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.

Dust Cloak.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...34...40 earth damage to adjacent foes.  End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...3...4 second[s]) on adjacent foes.

Staggering Force.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage.  Initial effect: deals 10...34...40 earth damage to nearby foes.  End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (1...8...10 second[s]) on nearby foes.

Pious Renewal.desc: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) End Effect: recharges itself and you gain 0...4...5 Energy and 0...24...30 Health.

Mirage Cloak.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (1...6...7 second[s].) You have 40...72...80% chance to block. Initial Effect: deals 10...34...40 earth damage to nearby foes.

Arcane Zeal.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy (maximum 1...6...7) for each enchantment on you whenever you cast a spell.

Mystic Vigor.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You gain 3...13...15 Health (maximum 25) for each enchantment on you whenever you hit with an attack.

Watchful Intervention.desc: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Heals for 50...170...200 the next time damage drops target ally's Health below 25%.

Vow of Piety.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds) +24 armor and +1...3...4 Health regeneration. Renewal: Whenever an enchantment on you ends.

Vital Boon.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You have +40...88...100 maximum Health. End effect: Heals you for 75...175...200.

Heart of Holy Flame.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal holy damage. Initial effect: deals 5...25...30 holy damage to nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Burning condition (2...4...5 seconds) on nearby foes.

Extend Enchantments.desc: Skill. (10 seconds.) Your next Dervish enchantment lasts 10...122...150% longer.

Faithful Intervention.desc: Enchantment Spell. You gain 30...126...150 Health the next time damage drops your Health below 50%.

Sand Shards.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deal 10...50...60 earth damage to all other adjacent foes whenever you hit with your scythe. Ends after 1...4...5 hit[s].

Lyssa's Haste.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. Initial Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. End Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.

Guiding Hands.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Your next 0...2...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. Initial effect: removes Blindness.

Fleeting Stability.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (2...5...6 seconds.) You cannot be knocked down and move 25% faster. Ends if knockdown prevented.

Armor of Sanctity.desc: Enchantment Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition on all adjacent foes (5...13...15). You take 5...17...20 less damage from foes with a condition. (15 seconds.)

Mystic Regeneration.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) You have +1...3...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.

Vow of Silence.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) Spells cannot target you. You cannot cast spells.

Avatar of Balthazar.desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You gain +20 armor against physical damage, you gain adrenaline 25% faster, your attacks deal holy damage, you inflict Burning (1...3...3 second[s]) on nearby foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Avatar of Dwayna.desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill, you lose 1 hex. Heal allies in earshot for 5...41...50 Health when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Avatar of Grenth.desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) Your scythe attacks deal dark damage and steal 0...10...12 Health. You are immune to Disease. Apply Disease to all adjacent foes (3 seconds) when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Avatar of Lyssa.desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and deal chaos damage with attacks. Steal 1 Energy from nearby foes when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Avatar of Melandru.desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You have +150 maximum Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 1 condition from all party members in earshot whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Meditation.desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Lose all adrenaline. Gain 1...3...4 Energy whenever an enchantment on you ends.

Eremite's Zeal.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: you gain 1...3...3 Energy (maximum 8) for each foe in earshot. End effect: you gain 1...3...3 Energy (maximum 8) for each foe in earshot.

Natural Healing.desc: Spell.  Heals you for 50...146...170. This skill activates 50% faster if you are not enchanted.

Imbue Health.desc: Spell. Heals for 5...41...50% of your current Health (maximum 300). Cannot self-target.

Mystic Healing.desc: Spell. Heals you for 5...53...65. Heals all enchanted party members for 5...53...65 Health.

Dwayna's Touch.desc: Touch Spell.  Heals for 15...51...60 (maximum 150) for each enchantment on you.

Pious Restoration.desc: Spell.  Gain 80...136...150 Health and remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: lose 1...2...2 hex[es].

Signet of Pious Light.desc: Signet. Heals for 30...126...150. Removes one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.

Intimidating Aura.desc: Enchantment Spell.  (60 seconds.) You have +40...88...100 max Health and take -1...8...10 damage from foes with less Health than you.

Mystic Sandstorm.desc: Spell. (3 seconds.) Deals 10...18...20 earth damage each second. Deals an additional 10...18...20 damage to attacking foes. Hits foes nearby your initial location. Lasts twice as long if you are enchanted.

Winds of Disenchantment.desc: Spell. Remove one of your Dervish enchantments.  Removal effect: all nearby foes lose 1 enchantment and take 20...68...80 cold damage.

Rending Touch.desc: Touch Spell. Deals 15...55...65 cold damage. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: target foe loses 1 enchantment and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline.

Crippling Sweep.desc: Scythe Attack. (3...10...12 seconds.) Inflicts Cripple [sic] condition. Deals +3...13...15 damage to moving foes.

Wounding Strike.desc: Elite Scythe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds). Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Wearying Strike.desc: Scythe Attack. Remove 1 Dervish Enchantment. Removal Effect: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (3...9...10 seconds). You are Weakened (10 seconds) if an enchantment is not lost.

Lyssa's Assault.desc: Scythe Attack. Interrupts an action. If you are enchanted, the interrupted skill is disabled for an additional 1...8...10 second[s]. This attack does 50% of normal damage.

Chilling Victory.desc: Scythe Attack. Deals +3...13...15 damage. Deals 10...26...30 cold damage to each foe hit who has less Health than you and foes adjacent to those targets.

Conviction.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Gain +10 armor while conditioned. Gain 1...3...3 Health regeneration for each condition you have. End Effect: Remove 1...2...2 condition[s].

Enchanted Haste.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds). You move 25% faster. Lose 1 condition if this enchantment ends prematurely.

Pious Concentration.desc: Stance. (5...17...20 seconds.) Prevents interrupts.  Prevention cost: you lose one Dervish enchantment or Pious Concentration ends.

Pious Haste.desc: Stance. (1...6...7 second[s].) Lose 1 Dervish enchantment and move 25% faster. Removal Effect: Run 50% faster instead.

Whirling Charge.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (1...5...6 second[s].) You move 33% faster. Deal 10...50...60 cold damage to all other nearby foes the next time you hit a foe and this enchantment ends.

Test of Faith.desc: Touch Spell. Deals 15...55...65 cold damage and removes 1 enchantment. Target foe is Dazed for 1...3...4 second[s] if that foe was not enchanted.

Blazing Spear.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +5...21...25 damage. Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]).

Mighty Throw.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. This spear moves three times faster.

Cruel Spear.desc: Elite Spear Attack. Deals +1...25...31 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target is not moving.

Harrier's Toss.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals 5...25...30 more damage if target is moving.

Spear of Lightning.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +8...18...20 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

Wearying Spear.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. You are Weakened (5 seconds).

Anthem of Fury.desc: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 1...3...4 adrenaline with their next attack skill.

Crippling Anthem.desc: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot inflict Crippled condition (5...13...15 seconds) with their next attack skill.

Defensive Anthem.desc: Elite Chant. (4...9...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block. Ends when hitting with an attack skill.

Godspeed.desc: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot move 25% faster while enchanted.

Anthem of Flame.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot inflict Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]) with their next attack skill.

\"Go for the Eyes!\".desc: Shout. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...86...100% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

Anthem of Envy.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...22...25 damage with their next attack skill. Damage bonus only applies to foes with more than 50% Health.

Song of Power.desc: Chant. (5...17...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain +4 Energy regeneration. Ends when using a skill.

Zealous Anthem.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...7...8 Energy with their next attack skill.

Aria of Zeal.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...5...6 Energy with their next spell.

Lyric of Zeal.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 1...7...8 Energy with their next signet.

Ballad of Restoration.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...63...75 Health the next time they take damage.

Chorus of Restoration.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot are healed for 30...78...90 with their next shout or chant.

Aria of Restoration.desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 30...78...90 Health with their next spell.

Energetic Was Lee Sa.desc: Item Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) You have +2 Energy regeneration. Drop effect: you gain +1...8...10 Energy.

Anthem of Disruption.desc: Chant. (1...8...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

Summon Spirits.desc: Spell. Spirits you control Shadow Step to your location and gain 60...100 Health.

Shadow Fang.desc: Hex Spell.  Shadow Step to target foe.  End effect after 10 seconds: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds); you return to your original location.

Calculated Risk.desc: Hex Spell. Target foe does +10 damage with attacks (3...20...24 seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum 15...83...100) will be done to that foe instead.

Shrinking Armor.desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -1...3...4 Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Aneurysm.desc: Spell. Target foe regains all Energy. For each point of Energy gained, target takes 1...3...3 damage and all adjacent foes lose 1 Energy (maximum 1...24...30).

Wandering Eye.desc: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: 30...94...110 damage to nearby foes.

Foul Feast.desc: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. You gain 0...36...45 Health and 0...2...2 Energy for each condition transferred. Half recharge if you remove Disease. Cannot self-target.

Putrid Bile.desc: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes -1...3...3 Health degeneration. Deals 25...73...85 damage to all nearby foes if target foe dies.

Shell Shock.desc: Spell. Deals 10...26...30 lightning damage. Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds). 25% armor penetration. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.

Glyph of Immolation.desc: Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 1...3...4 spell[s] that target[s] a foe also inflict[s] Burning condition (1...3...4 second[s]).

Patient Spirit.desc: Enchantment Spell. (2 seconds.) End effect: heals for 30...102...120. No effect if ends early.

Healing Ribbon.desc: Spell. Heals for 20...92...110. Heals two additional allies near target ally for 10...82...100. Cannot self-target.

Aura of Stability.desc: Enchantment Spell. (3...7...8 seconds.) Target ally cannot be knocked-down. Cannot self-target.

Spotless Mind.desc: Enchantment Spell. (1...12...15 seconds.) Removes a hex every 5 seconds. Cannot self-target.

Spotless Soul.desc: Enchantment Spell. (1...12...15 seconds.) Removes a condition every 3 seconds. Cannot self-target.

Disarm.desc: Sword Attack. Interrupts target foe. Interruption effect: disables this foe's attack skills (0...2...3 second[s]) if that action was an attack.

\"I Meant to Do That!\".desc: Shout. You gain 1...4...5 strikes of adrenaline if you are knocked-down.

Rapid Fire.desc: Preparation. (5...21...25 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while wielding a bow.

Sloth Hunter's Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. Deals +10...30...35 more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

Aura Slicer.desc: Melee Attack. (5...13...15 seconds.)Inflicts [sic] Bleeding condition. Also inflicts Cracked Armor (1...8...10 second[s]) if you are enchanted.

Zealous Sweep.desc: Scythe Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. You gain 3 Energy and 1 adrenaline for each foe you hit.

Pure Was Li Ming.desc: Item Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Conditions on you expire 10...42...50% faster. Drop effect: removes 1...3...4 condition[s] from allies in earshot.

Weapon of Aggression.desc: Weapon Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) You attack 25% faster.

Chest Thumper.desc: Spear Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

Hasty Refrain.desc: Echo. (3...9...11 seconds.) Target ally moves 25% faster. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally.

Critical Agility.desc: Enchantment Spell.  (4 seconds plus 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes.)  You attack 33% faster and gain +15...25 armor. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

Cry of Pain.desc: Spell.  Interrupts a skill. If target foe had a Mesmer hex, deals 25...50 damage to target and foes in the area and causes 3...5 Health degeneration (10 seconds).

Necrosis.desc: Skill. Deals 60...90 damage if target foe has a condition or hex.

Intensity.desc: Skill. (10 seconds.) The next time you deal elemental damage with a spell, other targets in the area take 60...70% of that damage.

Seed of Life.desc: Enchantment Spell. (2...5) seconds. Heals party members for 2 for each rank in Divine Favor whenever target takes damage. Cannot self target.

Whirlwind Attack.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +13...20 damage to target and adjacent foes.

Never Rampage Alone.desc: Skill. (18...25 seconds.) You and your pet attack 25% faster and have +1...3 Health regeneration.

Eternal Aura.desc: Enchantment Spell. You have +100 max Health. End effect: all party members in the area are resurrected with 40...50% Health and 20...30% Energy.

Vampirism.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 4...14 spirit (lifespan 75...150 seconds). Its attacks steal 10...20 Health, and you are healed for 10...20.

\"There's Nothing to Fear!\".desc: Shout. (4 seconds plus 1 second for every 2 ranks in Leadership.) Reduces damage by 20...35% for party members in earshot. End effect: heals for 35...60 Health.

Sneak Attack.desc: Melee Attack. Inflicts Blindness (5...8 seconds). Counts as a lead attack.

Trampling Ox.desc: Dual Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage; causes knock-down if target foe is Crippled. Must follow an off-hand attack.

Smoke Powder Defense.desc: Stance. (8 seconds.) The next time you are struck, you take half damage and inflict Blindness condition (2...5...6 seconds) on adjacent foes.

Confusing Images.desc: Hex Spell. (2...8...10 seconds). Target foe takes twice as long to activate non-attack skills.

Hexer's Vigor.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You have +1...7...8 Health regeneration. Ends if you use a non-hex skill.

Masochism.desc: Enchantment Spell.  (10...34...40 seconds.) You have +2 Death Magic and Soul Reaping. Sacrifice 5...3...3%  Health when you cast a spell.

Piercing Trap.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 5...41...50 piercing damage. Deals 15...51...60 more damage to any foes with Cracked Armor. Easily interrupted.

Companionship.desc: Skill. Heals you for 30...102...120 if you have less Health than your pet. Heals your pet for 30...102...120 if it has less Health than you.

Feral Aggression.desc: Skill. (5...17...20 seconds.) Your pet attacks 33% faster and deals +3...9...10 damage.

Disrupting Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: +10...34...40 damage if you interrupt a skill.

Volley.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +1...8...10 damage. Hits up to 3 foes adjacent to your target. All your preparations are removed.

Expert Focus.desc: Preparation. (24 seconds.) Your bow attack skills cost 1...2...2 less Energy and do +1...8...10 damage.

Pious Fury.desc: Stance. (1...6...7 second[s].)You [sic] attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.

Crippling Victory.desc: Scythe Attack. (3...7...8 seconds) Cripples target foe. If your health is greater than target foe's, all adjacent foes take 10...26...30 earth damage.

Sundering Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) Target ally's next 3 attacks inflict Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds) and have 10% armor penetration.

Weapon of Renewal.desc: Weapon Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) Target ally gains 1...6...7 Energy the next time this ally hits with an attack skill.

Maiming Spear.desc: Spear Attack. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe is Bleeding.

Signet of Deadly Corruption.desc: Signet. Deals 5...29...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe.

Way of the Master.desc: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) While holding a non-dagger weapon, you have +3...27...33% chance to land a critical hit.

Defile Defenses.desc: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Deals 30...102...120 damage the next time target foe blocks.

Angorodon's Gaze.desc: Spell. Steals 10...42...50 Health. You gain 3...10...12 Energy if you have a condition.

Magnetic Surge.desc: Enchantment Spell. Deals 15...63...75 damage. If you are Overcast, allies in earshot are enchanted for 1...4...5 [sic] and block the next attack against them.

Slippery Ground.desc: Spell. Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. Affects foes adjacent to your target. 50% failure chance unless Water Magic greater than 4.

Glowing Ice.desc: Spell. Deals 5...41...50 cold damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic.

Energy Blast.desc: Spell. Deals 1...2...2 damage (maximum 130) for each point of Energy you have.

Distracting Strike.desc: Melee Attack. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: Disables interrupted skill (20 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor. Deals no damage.

Symbolic Strike.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +12 damage (maximum 70) for each signet you have equipped.

Soldier's Speed.desc: Stance. (3...15...18 seconds.) You move 15% faster and an additional 15% while affected by a chant or shout.

Body Blow.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +10...34...40 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound (0...12...15 second[s]) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

Body Shot.desc: Bow Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. You gain 5...9...10 Energy if target foe has Cracked Armor.

Poison Tip Signet.desc: Signet. (60 seconds.) Inflicts Poisoned condition (8...14...15 seconds) with your next attack.

Signet of Mystic Speed.desc: Signet. (30 seconds.) Your next 1...3...3 self-targeted enchantments [sic] cast instantly. Flash enchantments do not consume uses of this skill.

Shield of Force.desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (1...13...16 second[s].) Blocks the next 1 attack against you. Knocks down and inflicts Weakness (5...17...20 seconds) on all adjacent attacking foes.

Mending Grip.desc: Spell. Heals for 15...63...75. Removes one condition if target ally is under a Weapon [sic] spell.

Spiritleech Aura.desc: Skill. (5...17...20 seconds.) All of your spirits within earshot deal 5...17...20 less damage and steal 5...17...20 Health when they attack.

Rejuvenation.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...16...20 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). Heals party members in earshot for 3...9...10 each second. Healing cost: this spirit loses 3...9...10 Health.

Agony.desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...10...12 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). Causes 3...9...10 Health loss each second to foes in earshot. This spirit loses 3...9...10 Health for each foe that loses Health.

Ghostly Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target ally's next attack is unblockable. Cannot self-target.

Inspirational Speech.desc: Skill. Target ally gains 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline. Cannot self-target. You lose all adrenaline.

Burning Shield.desc: Skill. (3...8...9 seconds.) Blocks the next attack skill against you. Inflicts Burning condition (1...5...6 second[s]) if it was a melee attack. No effect unless you are wielding a shield.

Holy Spear.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals 15...75...90 holy damage and inflicts Burning condition (3 seconds) to nearby foes if you hit a summoned creature.

Spear Swipe.desc: Spear Melee Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage and inflicts Dazed condition (4...9...10 seconds). This attack has melee range.

Alkar's Alchemical Acid.desc: Spell. Projectile: deals 40...50 damage to target and adjacent foes. Deals 45...70 more damage and inflicts Cracked Armor condition (14...20 seconds) to Destroyers.

Light of Deldrimor.desc: Spell. Deals 55...80 holy damage to foes in the area. Pings hidden objects within the area on the compass.

Ear Bite.desc: Touch Skill. Deals 50...70 piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (15...25 seconds).

Low Blow.desc: Touch Skill. Deals 45...70 damage. Inflicts 30...50 damage and Cracked Armor (14...20 seconds) if target foe is knocked down.

Brawling Headbutt.desc: Touch Skill. Deals 45...70 damage; causes knock-down.

\"Don't Trip!\".desc: Shout. (3...5 seconds.) Prevents knock-down; affects party members within earshot.

\"By Ural's Hammer!\".desc: Shout. (30 seconds.) Resurrect all dead party members in earshot with full Health and Energy. Affected party members deal 25...33% more damage. Affected party members die when it ends, but do not receive a death penalty.

Drunken Master.desc: Stance. (72...90 seconds.) You move and attack 10...15% faster if you are not drunk. You move and attack 25...33% faster if you are drunk.

Great Dwarf Weapon.desc: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) +15...20 weapon damage and 28...40% chance to cause knock-down with attacks.  Cannot self-target.

Great Dwarf Armor.desc: Enchantment Spell.  (22...40 seconds.)  +24 armor and +60 maximum Health.  Additional +24 armor against Destroyers.

Breath of the Great Dwarf.desc: Spell. Removes burning and heals for 50...60 Health. Affects party members.

Snow Storm.desc: Spell. Deals 30...40 cold damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target foe's initial location.

Black Powder Mine.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 20...30 damage. Inflicts Blindness and Bleeding conditions (7...10 seconds). Easily interrupted.

Summon Mursaat.desc: Spell. Summon a level 14...20 Mursaat (40...60 lifespan) that has Enervating Charge. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

Summon Ruby Djinn.desc: Spell. Summon a level 14...20 Ruby Djinn (40...60 lifespan) that has Immolate. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

Summon Ice Imp.desc: Spell. Summon a level 14...20 Ice Imp (40...60 lifespan) that has Ice Spikes. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

Summon Naga Shaman.desc: Spell. Summon a level 14...20 Naga Shaman (40...60 lifespan) that has Stoning. Only 1 Asura Summon can be active a time.

Deft Strike.desc: Ranged Attack. Deals 18...30 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition (18...30 seconds) if target foe has Cracked Armor.

Signet of Infection.desc: Signet. Inflicts Diseased condition 13...20 seconds if target foe is Bleeding.

Tryptophan Signet.desc: Signet. (14...20 seconds.) Target and adjacent foes move and attack 23...40% slower.

Ebon Battle Standard of Courage.desc: Ward Spell. (14...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +24 armor and +24 more armor against Charr. Spirits are unaffected.

Ebon Battle Standard of Wisdom.desc: Ward Spell. (14...20 seconds.) Spells that allies in this ward cast have a 44...60% chance to recharge 50% faster. Spirits are unaffected.

Ebon Battle Standard of Honor.desc: Ward Spell. (14...20 seconds.) Allies in this ward deal +8...15 damage and +7...10 more damage against Charr. Spirits are unaffected.

Ebon Vanguard Sniper Support.desc: Spell. Deals 54...90 piercing damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (5...25 seconds). 10% chance of +540...900 piercing damage. 25% chance of +540...900 piercing damage if target foe is a Charr.

Ebon Vanguard Assassin Support.desc: Spell. Summon a level 14...20 assassin that has Iron Palm, Fox Fangs, and Nine Tail Strike; it Shadow Steps to this foe. If this foe is a Charr, the assassin lives for 24...30 seconds. If target foe is not a Charr, the Assassin lives for 12...15 seconds.

Well of Ruin.desc: Well Spell. (5...25...30 seconds.) Inflicts Cracked Armor condition (5...17...20 seconds) to any foe in the well that takes physical damage. Exploits a fresh corpse.

Atrophy.desc: Hex Spell. (3...6...7 seconds.) Reduces this foe's primary attribute to 0.

Spear of Redemption.desc: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. If it fails to hit, you lose one condition.

\"Finish Him!\".desc: Shout. Deals 44...80 damage and inflicts Cracked Armor and Deep Wound conditions (12...20 seconds). No effect unless target foe has less than 50% Health.

\"Dodge This!\".desc: Shout. (16...20 seconds.) Your next attack is unblockable and deals +14...20 damage.

\"I Am the Strongest!\".desc: Shout. Your next 5...8 attacks deal +14...20 damage.

\"I Am Unstoppable!\".desc: Shout. (16...20 seconds.) You have +24 armor and cannot be knocked-down or Crippled.

A Touch of Guile.desc: Touch Hex Spell. Deals 44...80 damage. Target foe cannot attack (5...7...8 seconds) if it was knocked-down.

\"You Move Like a Dwarf!\".desc: Shout. Deals 44...80 damage, causes knock-down, and inflicts Crippled condition (8...15 seconds).

\"You Are All Weaklings!\".desc: Shout. Inflicts Weakness condition (8...12 seconds). Also affects adjacent foes.

Feel No Pain.desc: Skill. (30 seconds.) You have +2...3 Health regeneration. You have +200...300 maximum Health if you are drunk when activating this skill.

Club of a Thousand Bears.desc: Melee Attack. Deals +6...9 damage for each adjacent foe (maximum 60 damage). Causes knock-down if target foe is non-human.

Ursan Blessing.desc: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the bear (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and bear attacks replace your skills, and you have 100 armor and 750...790...800 Health.

Volfen Blessing.desc: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the wolf (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and wolf attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, 660...700  Health and 2...4 Health regeneration.

Raven Blessing.desc: Elite Form. You lose all effects and take on the aspect of the Raven (60 seconds). All your attributes are set to 0 and raven attacks replace your skills, and you have 80 armor, 660...700 Health, and a 20...30% block chance.

Mindbender.desc: Enchantment Spell. (10...16 seconds.) You move 20...33% faster and cast Spells 20% faster.

Smooth Criminal.desc: Spell. (10...20 seconds.) Disables one Spell. This skill becomes that Spell. You gain 5...10 Energy.

Technobabble.desc: Spell. Deals 30...40 damage to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Dazed condition (3...5 seconds) on these foes if target was not a boss.

Radiation Field.desc: Ward Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes -4...6 Health degeneration to foes in the area. End effect: inflicts Disease condition (12...20 seconds) to foes in the area.

Asuran Scan.desc: Hex Spell. (9...12 seconds.) You cannot miss target foe. If you kill this foe, you lose 5% Death Penalty.

Air of Superiority.desc: Skill. (20...30 seconds). Gain a random Asura benefit every time you earn experience from killing an enemy.

Mental Block.desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...11 seconds.) You have a 50% chance to block. Renewal: every time an enemy hits you.

Pain Inverter.desc: Hex Spell. (6...10 seconds.) Deals 100...140% of the damage (maximum 80) back to target foe every time it does damage.

Ebon Escape.desc: Spell. Heals you and target ally for 70...110. Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally. Cannot self-target.

Weakness Trap.desc: Trap. (90 seconds.) Affects nearby foes. Deals 24...50 lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition (10...20 seconds). Knocks-down Charr. Easily interrupted.

Winds.desc: Ebon Vanguard Ritual. Creates a level 4...10 spirit (54...90 second lifespan.) Affects foes within range. 15% chance to miss with ranged attacks.

Dwarven Stability.desc: Enchantment Spell. (24...30 seconds.) Your stances last 55...100% longer. You cannot be knocked-down if you activated this skill while drunk . [sic]

Call of Haste (PvP).desc: Shout. (30 seconds.) Your pet moves and attacks 25% faster.

Castigation Signet (Saul D'Alessio).desc: Signet. Deals 56...58...60 holy damage. You gain 10...11...11 Energy if target foe is attacking.

Unnatural Signet (Saul D'Alessio).desc: Signet. Deals 43...47 damage. Deals 26...29 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.

Mind Wrack (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (5...33...40 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills.  If target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...83...100 damage.

Mind Freeze (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. Deals 10...34...40 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...34...40 cold damage and causes 90% slower movement (1...4...5 second[s]).

Mind Shock (PvP).desc: Elite Spell. Deals 10...42...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, deals +10...42...50 lightning damage and causes knockdown. 25% armor penetration.

Mist Form (PvP).desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...38...45 seconds.) Take 33% less damage from foes hexed with Water Magic. Heals non-spirit allies in earshot for 50...210...250% of the energy cost of your elemental spells. Does not heal allies above 80% Health.

Ward Against Harm (PvP).desc: Elite Ward Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward have +1...3...3 Health regeneration, +12...22...24 armor, and +12...22...24 additional armor against elemental damage. Spirits are unaffected. This spell is disabled for 30 seconds.

Ride the Lightning (PvP).desc: Elite Spell. Deals 10...58...70 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration. Blinds all adjacent foes (1...4...5 second[s]). You instantly move to your target. May target allies.

Enraged Smash (PvP).desc: Elite Hammer Attack. Gives you 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline if you hit. Deals +10...34...40 damage and causes knockdown if target foe was moving.

Aegis (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (1...3...3 seconds). Target party member cannot be targeted by hostile spells. Attacks against this party member fail. Cannot self-target.

\"Watch Yourself!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have +5...21...25 armor. Ends after 1...3...3 incoming attack[s].

Ether Renewal (PvP).desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3...3 Energy and 5...17...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

Penetrating Attack (PvP).desc: Bow Attack. Deals +3...9...10 damage. 10% armor penetration.

Shadow Form (PvP).desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Hostile spells targeting you fail, and attacks against you miss. End effect: lose all but 5...41...50 Health.

Discord (PvP).desc: Elite Spell. Deals 30...94...110 damage. No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.

Sundering Attack (PvP).desc: Bow Attack. Deals +3...9...10 damage. 10% armor penetration.

Flesh of My Flesh (PvP).desc: Spell. Resurrect target party member (half your current Health and 5...17...20% Energy). Lose half your Health.

Ancestors' Rage (PvP).desc: Skill. (3 seconds.) Deals 1...33...41 lightning damage to foes adjacent to target ally each second.

Splinter Weapon (PvP).desc: Weapon Spell. (20 seconds.) Attacks deal 5...25...30 damage to 3 [sic] adjacent foes. Ends after 1...4...5 attack[s].

Assassin's Remedy (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next 1...8...10 attack skills each remove one condition.

Light of Deliverance (PvP).desc: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5...57...70. Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).

Death Pact Signet (PvP).desc: Signet. Resurrects target party member with your current Health and 15...83...100% maximum Energy. For 120 seconds, you die the next time this party member dies.

Harrier's Toss (PvP).desc: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals 5...25...30 more damage if target is moving.

Defensive Anthem (PvP).desc: Elite Chant. (4...9...10 seconds.) Party members in earshot have 50% chance to block. Ends when hitting with an attack skill.

Ballad of Restoration (PvP).desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 15...63...75 Health the next time they take damage.

Song of Restoration (PvP).desc: Elite Chant. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain 45...97...110 Health with their next skill.

\"Incoming!\" (PvP).desc: Elite Shout. (4...9...10 seconds) Allies in earshot move 33% faster and gain 5...13...15 Health while moving.

\"Never Surrender!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (10 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +1...4...5 Health regeneration. Only affects party members below 75% Health.

\"For Great Justice!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (8 seconds.) You gain 1 extra strike of adrenaline whenever you hit with an attack.

Mystic Regeneration (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) You have +1...3...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 3) on you.

Enfeebling Blood (PvP).desc: Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition (1...13...16 second[s]) on this foe and nearby foes.

Signet of Judgment (PvP).desc: Elite Half Range Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 5...41...50 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

Unyielding Aura (PvP).desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Resurrects target party member (full Health, full Energy). End effect: this ally dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Does not incur a death penalty. 50% failure chance unless Divine Favor 5 or more.

Spirit Bond (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...78...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.

Weapon of Warding (PvP).desc: Weapon Spell. (3...7...8 seconds.) +2...4...4 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block. Ends if target ally attacks.

Smiter's Boon (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

Sloth Hunter's Shot (PvP).desc: Bow Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals +5...13...15 more damage if target foe is not using a skill.

Expert's Dexterity (PvP).desc: Elite Stance. (1...16...20 second[s].) You attack 15% faster and you gain +1 to your Marksmanship attribute.

Signet of Spirits (PvP).desc: Elite Signet. You gain 3...10...12 Energy. No effect unless you are within earshot of a spirit.

Signet of Ghostly Might (PvP).desc: Elite Signet. Target allied summoned creature deals +5...29...35 damage. That creature is destroyed after 10 seconds.

Read the Wind (PvP).desc: Preparation. (24 seconds). Your arrows move twice as fast.

Fragility (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...17...20 damage each time it gains or loses a condition.

Strength of Honor (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals 1...4...5 more damage in melee.

Warrior's Endurance (PvP).desc: Elite Stance. (5...29...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. No Energy gain if you have more than 10...22...25 Energy.

Armor of Unfeeling (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) You have 10 base damage reduction while casting binding rituals.

Union (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Whenever a non-spirit ally within range takes damage or life steal, that damage is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage.

Shadowsong (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual.  Creates a level 1...5...6 spirit (30-second lifespan).  Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and inflict Blindness condition (1...5...6 second[s]).

Pain (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...25...30 damage.

Destruction (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30 second lifespan). On death, it deals 1...8...10 damage for each second it was alive to all foes in the area (maximum 150 damage).

Soothing (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Building adrenaline takes twice as long for foes within range.

Displacement (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have 75% chance to block. Block effect: this spirit takes 60 damage.

Preservation (PvP).desc: Elite Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 Spirit (90 second lifespan). Every 4 seconds this spirit heals one non-spirit ally for 10...94...115.

Life (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (20 second lifespan). Affects non-spirit allies within range. End effect: heals for 1...6...7 for each second this spirit was alive.

Recuperation (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range have +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

Dissonance (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (10...22...25 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and interrupt actions.

Earthbind (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Any time non-spirit foes within range are knocked down, they are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 50...30...25 Health.

Shelter (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Non-spirit allies within range cannot lose more than 10% maximum Health from a single attack. Damage prevention cost: this spirit loses 75...51...45 Health.

Disenchantment (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (10...30...35 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and remove one enchantment.

Restoration (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30 second lifespan). End effect: resurrects party members in the area with 5...41...50% Health and zero Energy.

Bloodsong (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (30...126...150 second lifespan). Its attacks steal 5...21...25 Health.

Wanderlust (PvP).desc: Elite Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Its attacks against stationary foes cause knock-down. Knock-down cost: this spirit loses 70...54...50 Health.

Savannah Heat (PvP).desc: Elite Spell. Deals 5...17...20 fire damage for each second since casting this spell (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location.

Gaze of Fury (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Destroys an allied spirit. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage.

Anguish (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...6...7 spirit (15...39...45 second lifespan). Its attacks deal 5...17...20 damage.  Double damage to hexed foes.

Empowerment (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (15...51...60 second lifespan).  Allies in range holding an item gain 15...39...45 maximum Health and 10 maximum Energy.

Recovery (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...8...10 spirit (30...54...60 second lifespan). Conditions on allies in range expire 20...44...50% faster.

\"Go for the Eyes!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot have +30...66...75% to land a critical hit with their next attack.

\"Brace Yourself!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (5...13...15 seconds.) Prevents the next knock-down and deals 15...63...75 damage to one foe near target ally. Cannot self-target.

Blazing Finale (PvP).desc: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...3...3 second[s]) to adjacent foes whenever a chant or shout ends on target ally. Cannot target spirits.

Bladeturn Refrain (PvP).desc: Echo. (20 seconds.) Target ally has +10...34...40 armor against slashing damage. Renewal: Whenever a chant or shout ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

Signet of Return (PvP).desc: Signet. Resurrects target party member (5...13...15% Health and 1...3...4% Energy for each party member in earshot).

\"Can't Touch This!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (20 seconds.) The next 1...4...5 touch-range skill[s] used against you fail[s].

\"Stand Your Ground!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Party members in earshot gain +24 armor when not moving. Ends for an ally if that ally attacks.

\"We Shall Return!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (10 seconds.) Whenever party members in earshot use a resurrection skill, their fallen allies return with 10...62...75% more Health and 5...41...50% more Energy.

\"Find Their Weakness!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target ally inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) with the next critical hit.

\"Never Give Up!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. Allies in earshot gain 1...8...10 Energy. Only affects allies below 75% Health.

\"Help Me!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (1...8...10 seconds.) Other allies' spells targeting you cast 50% faster. You gain 5...41...50 Health.

\"Fall Back!\" (PvP).desc: Shout. (4...9...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain 5...13...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. Ends for an ally if that ally hits with an attack.

Agony (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...7...8 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). Causes 3...9...10 Health loss each second to foes in earshot. This spirit loses 3...9...10 Health for each foe that loses Health.

Rejuvenation (PvP).desc: Binding Ritual. Creates a level 1...13...16 spirit (30...78...90 second lifespan). Heals party members in earshot for 3...9...10 each second. Healing cost: this spirit loses 3...9...10 Health.

Anthem of Disruption (PvP).desc: Chant. (1...8...10 seconds.) Allies in earshot interrupt an action with their next attack skill.

Comfort Animal (PvP).desc: Skill. Your pet gains 20...87...104 Health. Resurrects your pet (10...48...58% Health.)

Melandru's Assault (PvP).desc: Pet Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Deals +5...29...35 more damage to target and foes adjacent to target if this foe is enchanted.

Shroud of Distress (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block. No effect unless your Health is below 50%.

Unseen Fury (PvP).desc: Stance. (15...51...60 seconds.) You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes.

Predatory Bond (PvP).desc: Shout. (5...17...20 seconds.) You gain 1...25...31 Health whenever your pet makes a successful attack.

Enraged Lunge (PvP).desc: Elite Pet Attack. Deals +3...19...23 damage (maximum 80) for each of your recharging Beast Mastery skills.

Signet of Deadly Corruption (PvP).desc: Signet. Deals 5...29...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe. Must follow a dual attack.

Masochism (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You gain 1...3...3 Energy whenever you sacrifice Health.

Unholy Feast (PvP).desc: Spell. Steals 10...54...65 Health from 1...3...4 foe[s] in the area around you.

Signet of Agony (PvP).desc: Signet. Deals 10...58...70 damage to foes near you. You begin Bleeding (25 seconds).

Escape (PvP).desc: Elite Stance. (1...7...8 second[s].) You move 33% faster and have 75% chance to block. Ends if you make a melee attack.

Death Blossom (PvP).desc: Dual Attack. Deals +20...40...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. Must follow an off-hand attack.

Finale of Restoration (PvP).desc: Echo. (10...30...35 seconds.) Target ally gains [sic] 15...63...75 Health the next 5 times a shout or chant ends on that ally. Cannot target spirits.

Mantra of Resolve (PvP).desc: Stance. (5 seconds.) Prevents interrupts against you. Prevention cost: lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

Charm Animal (Codex).desc: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. Failure unless Beast Mastery 8 or higher.

Lightning Reflexes (PvP).desc: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and have 75% chance to block.

Renewing Smash (PvP).desc: Hammer Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. You gain 3 energy and this attack recharges instantly if target foe was knocked down.

Heal as One (PvP).desc: Elite Skill. Heals you and your pet for 25...121...145. If your pet is dead, it is resurrected with 50% Health. No effect if neither you nor your pet are below 75% Health.

Glass Arrows (PvP).desc: Elite Preparation. (10...30...35 seconds.) Your arrows deal +5...11...12 damage. Inflicts Bleeding condition if blocked (10...18...20 seconds).

Keen Arrow (PvP).desc: Bow Attack. Deals +1...4...5 damage. Deals +5...25...30 more damage if you land a critical hit.

Anthem of Envy (PvP).desc: Chant. (10 seconds.) Allies in earshot do +10...18...20 damage with their next attack skill. Damage bonus only applies to foes with more than 50% Health.

Mending Refrain (PvP).desc: Echo. (15 seconds.) You have +2...3...3 Health regeneration. Renewal: whenever a chant or shout ends on you.

Empathy (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Target foe takes 15...39...45 damage whenever it attacks.

Crippling Anguish (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower and has -1...4...5 Health degeneration.

Soldier's Stance (PvP).desc: Elite Stance. (4...9...10 seconds.) You attack 33% faster while under the effects of a shout or chant.

Destructive Was Glaive (PvP).desc: Elite Item Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) Your Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. Drop effect: deals 15...71...85 lightning damage to all foes in the area.

Mantra of Signets (PvP).desc: Stance. (10...34...40 seconds.) You gain 5...49...60 Health each time you use a signet.

Shatter Delusions (PvP).desc: Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: 15...63...75 damage to target and all adjacent foes.

Illusionary Weaponry (PvP).desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 8...34...40 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.

Migraine (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. (3...10...12 seconds.) Causes -1...7...8 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.

Accumulated Pain (PvP).desc: Spell. Deals 10...30...35 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if target foe has 2 or more hexes.

Psychic Instability (PvP).desc: Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, causes knockdown for 2...3...3 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.

Shared Burden (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (5...17...20 seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.

Stolen Speed (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes (1...8...10 second[s]). Doubles spell casting time. Spells you cast on hexed foes have -50% casting time.

Unnatural Signet (PvP).desc: Signet. Deals 10...50...60 damage. Deals 10...50...60 damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted. Your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled (10 seconds).

Spiritual Pain (PvP).desc: Spell. Deals 5...33...40 damage. Deals 25...105...125 damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.

Frustration (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Causes 50% slower spell casting. Target foe takes 5...41...50 damage whenever interrupted.

Mistrust (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) The next spell that target foe casts on one of your allies fails and deals 10...62...75 damage to target and nearby foes.

Enchanter's Conundrum (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. Causes 100...180...200% slower enchantment casting (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals 10...82...100 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is not enchanted.

Signet of Clumsiness (PvP).desc: Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals 15...51...60 damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.

Mirror of Disenchantment (PvP).desc: Spell. Removes one enchantment from target foe. That foe's party members also lose this enchantment.

Wandering Eye (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: 10...76...92 damage to nearby foes.

Calculated Risk (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. Target foe does +10 damage with attacks (3...10...12 seconds). There is a 50% chance that the damage from each attack (maximum 10...50...60) will be done to that foe instead.

Defy Pain (PvP).desc: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) You have +90...258...300 maximum Health and +20 armor.

Spoil Victor (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Causes 15...63...75 Health loss whenever target foe attacks or casts spells on a creature with less Health.

Visions of Regret (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take 10...26...30 damage whenever they use a skill and 5...33...40 additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.

Fox Fangs (PvP).desc: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

Wild Strike (PvP).desc: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

Banishing Strike (PvP).desc: Melee Attack. Deals 10...50...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

Twin Moon Sweep (PvP).desc: Melee Attack. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain 10...18...20 Health. Removal effect: Unblockable, attack twice, each strike doing 25% less damage, and gain 10...26...30 more Health.

Irresistible Sweep (PvP).desc: Scythe Attack.  Deals +3...13...15 damage.  Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments.  Removal effect: unblockable, removes a stance.

Pious Assault (PvP).desc: Melee Attack. Removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this skill recharges 75% faster and adjacent foes take 10...26...30 damage.

Guiding Hands (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Your next 0...2...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. Initial effect: removes Blindness.

Avatar of Dwayna (PvP).desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) Deal holy damage. You lose 1 hex whenever you use a Dervish attack skill. Heal yourself for 5...41...50 Health whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Avatar of Melandru (PvP).desc: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You have +100 maximum Health, +30 elemental armor, and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 2 conditions from yourself whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Mystic Healing (PvP).desc: Spell. Heals you for 5...53...65. Heals all enchanted party members for 5...53...65 Health.

Signet of Pious Restraint (PvP).desc: Signet. (5...13...15 seconds.) Cripples target foe and removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.

Fevered Dreams (PvP).desc: Elite Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires.

Aura of Thorns (PvP).desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...7...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

Dust Cloak (PvP).desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...34...40 earth damage to adjacent foes.  End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...3...4 second[s]) on adjacent foes.

Lyssa's Haste (PvP).desc: Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 33% faster. Initial Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. End Effect: interrupts all adjacent foes. 50% failure chance unless Wind Prayers 5 or higher.

Onslaught (PvP).desc: Elite Flash Enchantment Spell. (2...7...8 seconds.) You attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

Wounding Strike (PvP).desc: Elite Scythe Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds). Removes 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds).

Pious Fury (PvP).desc: Stance. (1...4...5 second[s].)You [sic] attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.

Illusion of Haste (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) You move 33% faster. End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).

Illusion of Pain (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (8 seconds.) Causes -3...9...10 Health degeneration and target foe takes 3...9...10 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for 36...103...120. Ends if reapplied.

Aura of Restoration (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...360...400% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

Web of Disruption (PvP).desc: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.

Lightning Hammer (PvP).desc: Spell. Deals 10...82...100 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

Elemental Flame (PvP).desc: Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (1...2...2 second[s]) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.

Slippery Ground (PvP).desc: Spell. Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. 50% failure chance unless Water Magic 5 or higher.

Time Ward.desc: Elite Ward Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Allies in this ward cast spells 15...19...20% faster and recharge skills 15...19...20% faster. Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill

Soul Taker.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...25...30 seconds.) Attacks deal +15...19...20 damage and sacrifice 15...19...20 health. PvE Skill

Over the Limit.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. Spells cast 15...19...20% faster and recharge 15...43...50% faster. Continuously gain Overcast while active. PvE Skill

Judgment Strike.desc: Elite Melee Attack. Attacks target and adjacent foes for +13...27...30 Holy damage. Causes knock down on attacking foes. PvE Skill

Seven Weapons Stance.desc: Elite Stance. (3...17...20 seconds.) Weapon attributes are increased by +1...12...15. You attack 33% faster. PvE Skill

\"Together as One!\".desc: Elite Shout. (3...13...15 seconds.) All party members near you or your pet deal +5...13...15 damage [sic] and gain +1...6...7 Health regeneration. PvE Skill

Shadow Theft.desc: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...17...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...4...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...4...5. Counts as a Lead Attack. PvE Skill

Weapons of Three Forges.desc: Elite Weapon Spell. (3...17...20 seconds.) Allies in earshot gain the effect of a random Weapon Spell. Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill

Vow of Revolution.desc: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...9...10 seconds.) Gain +1...4...5 energy regeneration. Renewal: whenever you use a non-Dervish skill. PvE Skill

Heroic Refrain.desc: Elite Echo. (3...13...15 seconds.) Target ally gains +1...3...3 to all attributes. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally. Cannot target spirits. PvE Skill
